data.title: Welcome to Idaho State Police
data.text:
Injury Crash on US Highway 95 near Pollock, Idaho

ISP investigates multi-vehicle crash on US95 near Pollock in Idaho County, Idaho. Pollock, Idaho- Idaho State Police is investigating a two-vehicle collision on US Highway 95. There were multiple injuries. Just before 20:33 p.m. this evening, Idaho State Police (ISP) troopers responded to a multi-vehicle crash on US Highway 95. During the investigation it was […]

Two vehicle collision in Jerome County

JEROME COUNTY, Idaho – Idaho State Police is investigating a two-vehicle collision that occurred at 2:15 p.m. on August 9, 2024. A 26-year-old male from Wendell, ID and a juvenile passenger were traveling in a 1998 Freightliner semi-truck loaded with manure, eastbound on Interstate 84 (I84) near milepost 180. A 49-year-old male from Clovis, CA, […]

MEDIA ADVISORY: New Idaho State Police Director to be Sworn in During Change of Command Ceremony

MERIDIAN, Idaho—The Idaho State Police (ISP) will hold a change of command ceremony on August 14 at 10:00 a.m. at the ISP Meridian Headquarters, located at 700 S. Stratford Dr. This ceremony will mark the transfer of leadership from Colonel Kedrick Wills, the outgoing Director, to Colonel Bill Gardiner, the incoming Director. Colonel Wills, a […]
